chordmaker.info.buttons.random-text: Selects a number of note randomly
chordmaker.info.card1.text:
Chordmaker is a chord encyclopedia where you can search for chords and their features by selecting
            their notes.
chordmaker.info.card2.search-text: All the chords found with the combinations of selected notes will be showed. Click on a chord to see all its traits and infos.
chordmaker.info.card2.select-text:
You can select a note by clicking on it.
The first note will be the tonic of your chord
chordmaker.main.title: Chordmaker
metronome.info.buttons.animations-text: Toggles the animations of the metronomes
metronome.info.buttons.back-text: Goes back to the metronome options
metronome.info.card1.text: Metro is a metronome and polyrhythm generator.
metronome.info.card2.beats-text: Changes the number of beats for each measure
metronome.info.card2.bpm-text: This is the current bpm value. You can change it using the slider, the buttons or the tap feature
metronome.info.card2.color-text: Changes the color of this metronome
metronome.info.card2.customize-text: Change the color and sound of every metronome
metronome.info.card2.final-text: Shows the bpm when the metronome will stop increasing
metronome.info.card2.measures-text: Shows the number of measure between each increment
metronome.info.card2.sound-text: Changes the sound of this metronome
metronome.info.card2.step-text: Shows the number of bpm added each time
metronome.info.card2.tap-text: Tap along with a song beat to adjust the metronome to the song bpm
metronome.info.card2.tempo-text: Change the tempo with the following options
metronome.info.card2.training-text: Train yourself increasing the bpm over time
metronome.main.title: Metro
notefinder.info.buttons.random-text: Selects a number of filters randomly
notefinder.info.card1.text: Notefinder is a chord encyclopedia where you can search for chords using various filters
notefinder.info.card2.search-text: All the chords found with the selected filters will be showed. Click on a chord to see all its traits and infos.
notefinder.info.card2.select-text: You can select a tonic and then filter by quality, grade or simply type the chord symbol in the search bar.
notefinder.main.title: Notefinder
settings.main.title: Settings
